website_summaries.verdict: A stainless steel coozie designed to work with cans and beer bottles.
pros: Top has a beer bottle opener
Bottle and can both stick out enough for comfortable drinking
keeps your drink cold to the last sip
Top also helps keep bugs out of your bottle
cons: Neck for bottles is not insulated
The included bottle opener is a bit flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It keeps my beer cold, but the neck is just regular plastic with no insulation. The bottle opener is worthless, as it bent the first time I tried to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick N

customer_reviews.title: You dont know you need this until you get it
customer_reviews.text: These really work, bought for Mexico - beer was just as cold at first sip to last. BONUS just hanging - our resort wouldnt allow glass bottles at pool or beach;they inspected these and allowed my wife and I to drink bottles at beach and pool. Must buy for vacationers to Mexico-Hawaii-hot climate. Great buy for just hanging around the house or camping.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bezos

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband for Fathers Day. He loves it. He uses it on really hot and humid days and it keeps his beer cold and the top covers his beer in between drinks so no bugs go in it. The bottle opener on the top is flimsy unless you remove the metal piece and then open your beer. No issues with what type of beers fit in this container. From Sam Adams to Flat Tire, very universal. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley Map

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a stocking stuffer for a friend who enjoys a cold one (or two) on the weekends, so I haven't given it to him yet. However, I took it out of the box to see if different size beer bottles will work with it since I'd hate to give a gift to someone and they can't use it. From the few different sized bottles I had in the refrigerator, they all seemed to fit so I'm hoping it'll work well for my friend. Great concept.
customer_reviews.author: DJ_Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Kept my beer cold!
customer_reviews.text: This coozie works very well, the rubber seals inside it keep your beer bottle from clanking and moving around while drinking. My beer was cold start to finish, and the construction seems good and like it will last a long time. The bottle opener leaves a bit to be desired-I removed it and honestly never tried to use it. Compared to the cloth coozies this works much better, it's quite hefty feeling with a full beer inside, but not annoyingly heavy. The copper color is also very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Marmie

customer_reviews.title: Sent me uses product, full of sand
customer_reviews.text: Terrible!!!!! Received for hubby's birthday and was full of sand and scratched up!!!! It was used!!! I paid for new. How embarrassing when my husband opened in front of all and it was used!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Armour Floors

customer_reviews.title: Lost the sticker!!
customer_reviews.text: This works great to keep the drinks cold, but it lost all the black sticker on the outside of the coolie!!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Hicks

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC! I love this product because it can be ...
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC! I love this product because it can be used with bottled beer as well as canned beer. Two products for the price of one!! It does a wonderful job of keeping your beverage cold for a very long time. I like the fact that it has a "cover" for beer bottles so no critters have access to enjoying your beverage!!! Great product at a wonderful price!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps beer cold and beer drinker happy! Wonderful item. I have recommended this product to all my friends!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT fit Sierra Nevada bottle
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my fiancee' for fathers day as he is a very "loyal" beer drinker. His favorite is Sierra Nevada and it comes in a bottle and the neck of the bottle did not go past the opening but deep down to where if he wanted to use this he would have to "waterfall" it into his mouth. Im bummed I cannot even returns this because my fiancee' got trash happy and tossed out the box.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: It definitely works as advertised. It keeps your beer cold 'til the last drink. The top black plastic part is more of just a plastic cover that screws onto the bottom. The bottom works with a can or bottle. I've seen some reviews about how the bottle opener comes out of the rubber top when trying to open a bottle. The instructions that came with mine said to remove the bottle opener from that rubber top, open the bottle, and then return it to the rubber top for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Stevens

customer_reviews.title: This really does keep your beverage cold.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this since I grew weary of my Bottle Keeper not adequately maintaining a good beer drinking temperature. Although Bottle Keeper now offers a double wall cooler, it is more expensive than these. I purchased TWO. Love 'em!! They work well for cans, also, if you occasionally drink canned beer.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: top does not securely close
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this model instead of "bottle keeper" brand, because I liked the convenience of being able to remove the upper half to accommodate a can. What I was unaware of, is that the very top portion with the bottle opener, is soft silicone, and has no way of closing tightly. If you knocked it accidentally it will just fall off, also the bottle opener pops right out, it is not attached to the silicone top.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda nugent

customer_reviews.title: Bottles won’t fit.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived slightly dented, which is no surprise because the packaging was literally a thin, flat cardboard box. I can deal with a lot without complaining so I just moved on. Put a bottle of Dos Equis in it... lid won’t screw on. Checked it out, pushed it down, tried again several times, nope. The neck of the bottle cover is too small. Won’t fit. Grabbed a yuengling bottle... nope, even worse. Grabbed another amber ale, it won’t fit either having the same problem. Product will be returned and in general I NEVER return anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Ambrister

customer_reviews.title: Hubby approved.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for the hubby. The insulation is not all the way to the top but he said it still keeps Jo's beer cold. I had it custom painted and he loves it! This is a great gift for the man who has e6or buys himself everything he wants already.
customer_reviews.author: LizTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: VERY DIFFICULT TO USE
customer_reviews.text: THE ITEM I THOUGHT WOULD BE TERRIFIC TO KEEP OUR BEERS COLD, BUT BY THE TIME YOU WERE ABLE TO GET THE BEER INTO THE ITEM IT WAS ALREADY WARM. I FOUND THAT IT DID NOT KEEP THE BEER COLD. i MIGHT HAVE BEEN ABLE TO KEEP AND POWER THROUGH FOR A CHEAPER PRICE, BUT THESE WERE PRICEY SORRY JUST WAS NOT WHAT WE WERE LOOKING FOR.
customer_reviews.author: Marg

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase of this Cooler. My husband likes this "koozie" best out of the 12 others we own, including a Yeti, because it's so darn versatile and of great quality. The Cooler works for 99% of the bottles or cans out there except for one of hubby's favorite bottled IPAs. It isn't quite tall enough to use the extended bottle section. But works just fine using the lower section only. The Asobu Cooler is a godsend for sitting outside by the pool when it's summer in Florida. Keeps the beer cool and crispy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to finding a bottle & can cooler that would actually keep my drink "frosty" while I drank it. Unfortunately this Asobu cooler was not the one. The Asobu cooler is attractive, appears to be well made and looks like it will do the job. The cooler consists of four separate components that you assemble around your bottle/can, The fully assembled cooler is rather bulky, uncomfortable to hold and awkward drink from. The Asobu cooler does keep my drink cool-cold but definitely not frosty like I had hoped. The foam sleeve I bought at the market works just as well at a fraction of the cost. Disappointing ...
customer_reviews.author: FPJ

customer_reviews.title: Large and in charge!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is large, but has to be to accommodate different sized bottles and include an appropriate amount of insulation. It keeps bottled beverages cold more than long enough for casual consumption. The only downside is the bad bottle opener, but it's not bad enough to lose a star over. I need another one for guests and/or family so they don't steal mine.
customer_reviews.author: Shenandoah Dreams

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my roommate. We live in Florida, and spend a lot of time on boats and outdoors, so keeping beers cold is important. This works spectacularly, for cans (slim ones, even) and bottles. The last sip is just as cold as the first. Only thing I would mention, is that it's kind of heavy, so you don't notice by weight or temperature when your drink is gone! I was wary of the higher price, but thought, hey, it would make a nice gift, so I splurged, but I am going to order one for myself now, because his works so well!
customer_reviews.author: lcsitl

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: One of the bottle openers was missing from the end upon arrival. The rubber part had lint stuck to it and appeared discolored. I bought it as a gift, but it appeared too poorly made to give. It cost me over $29 to return the two sets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Too many pieces, top portion not insulated, doesn't keep beer real cold
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this beer holder. I like that it has multiple uses (can or long neck). So far, doing a great job of keeping the beverage cold. The only thing is that the “can” opener is not necessary but that’s because I drink Mic Ultra and I don’t need a “lid” for my beer. That does not mean I would not purchase again, quite the opposite. I am buying another for my love!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie_458

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for muddying  and ATV riding!
customer_reviews.text: This bottle holder is perfect for when we go muddying and riding in our ATV’s! No more having to waste beer because of dust and mud! Only complaint would be that the top doesn’t stay attached and if it had a lanyard attached to the bottle it would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda F.

customer_reviews.title: Bottle opener is cheap and doesnt really work, it is a heavy cooler.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a can/bottle koozie that would fit almost any can or bottle and this does it. Bought 2 for Fathers day gifts, little pricey but keeps beer cold and drinkable for atleast 45 mins. Its very deceptive though, you think you got alot of drink left when in fact you dont have much and you end up saying "dang, i just opened that!" and its empty. Gave it 3 stars on value because the opener bent 1st time we used it and we even removed it from the cap before opening the bottle. And did i mention it was pricey for the value. Overall we like them, got the silver & the copper one. Like the colors, hate the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I’ve ever made
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I’ve ever made. They fit most of my beer bottles perfectly, and keeps them ice cold from start to finish. They work the best when I’m outside working on the yard or laying out by the pool in the blazing Southern California heat! And you can use them for a can or bottle. For the price, they are well worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: This is a huge bottle holder
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my boyfriend who like yeti can coolers, but this bottle holder was huge! It was way too clunky and big to hold in your hand. Not sure who would want to use this. Never got to try it because I returned it based on looks & size.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: great, but...
customer_reviews.text: I love these bottles! They definitely keep beverages cooler. My only dislike is the bottle opener doesn't stay in the rubber top very well. It does come with an extra bottle opener, but that doesn't help the fact that the bottle opener comes out of the top when you try to open a bottle. Other than that, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Suter

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work well with my bottles
customer_reviews.text: With Anchor Steam bottles the seal on the lower portion is a little too large for these bottles. I was hoping that since it stated "Perfect size for any beer can or bottle" that it would fit with no problems. I have decided to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Good except bottle opener
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is that the bottle Opener has to be taken out to be used and is easily lost.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Does more than I anticipated. Many Pro's, 1 minor Con.
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty surprised at how impressed I was with this product. I originally intended to buy the BottleKeeper but saw this Asobu was not only cheaper, but wayyyyy more versatile. Fit all of my bottles and cans without issue. The rubber bottle cap attachment was something I didn't even realize it had until receiving the product. Only thing I would change about it is the bottle opener accessory. I wish it was permenantly fixed to the insulator as I can see these getting lost after using them at the beach considering that reinserting the opener into the cap isn't exactly the easiest process. But all in all, I'm very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lukaszczyk

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it does. But, it's HUGE! Not comfortable to hold for anyone less than a Big &Tall Man. It is still useful to me tho. I can bring a backup drink an slip it into my bag. I froze my drink first an it didn't unfreeze for days. An accidental experiment. We were all amazed. Now, do you have one for a 6 pack? I like to dream big! Get on it for me please. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be a better product
customer_reviews.text: It works ok inside but didn't try it yet outside in the heat. Pay attention to the photo's posted. The top half of the bottle cooler is plastic with no insulation leaving the top half of the bottle exposed to the environmental temperature. So if your a sipper, I don't expect this to keep my beverage as cold through the duration. It's quite a bit of money for what you get. They could have lined the inside of the top half with neoprene or molded it with insulation inside for the price you pay for this.
customer_reviews.author: MA in TN

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Fathers Day and it’s probably the one present he has actually used ever. Keeps beer cold forever. He liked that he can switch to use it for cans. We have not run into any issues with a bottle not fitting (that was a review I read before purchasing that made me apprehensive). He liked that the top has an opener right on it. He gets so many compliments on it when he brings it to social events.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: I dropped the plastic piece (top half) by itself by accident one time and the rim chipped off. The top part should also be made of metal with a rubber rim to improve quality and design. Doesn't make sense even with insulation to make half out of metal and half out of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Cabral

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and simply works
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bottle and can cooler there is. My wife and I live in the desert of southern AZ and although we don't mind sitting on the shaded porch in a 100+ degree evening it is nice to have a realy cold beer. Well, this double wall stainless steel cooler with the rubber seals will keep a can or bottle of beer cold as you take your time enjoying it cold to the very last sip. Well worth the money if you like cold beer in a hot place.
customer_reviews.author: Karl W. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: It really keeps the drink cold until the last drop.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my husbands birthday. He loved it so much we bought one for our son and son-in law. The only problem is they keep thinking they just opened their beer cause it’s so cold to the last drop. They all 3 love this product.👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps beer cold but wish it came in different sizes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas and he uses it every day. Keeps his beer cold and cant wait for summer to see how it does. Only thing I wish is that there were different sizes to choose from. He drinks Guinness and the can of course is much larger than your typical beer can.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Seeing is believing!
customer_reviews.text: I can only say that seeing is believing! Left my cold beer poolside in the hot sun and when I picked it up, the metal sleeve was quite warm (actually hot) to the touch. I was convinced that I would have to replace this warm beer with another from the cooler, but took a swig anyway - WOW! The beer was still frosty cold! My son-in-law loved the one I got him so much, I got him another!
customer_reviews.author: L. Brazzi

customer_reviews.title: 100 degrees outside cold beer inside
customer_reviews.text: 100 degrees outside, ice cold beer on the inside. Not sure of durability but looks to be well made. Sat outside for over a half hour and beer still cold. Can't wait for it to get hot to see how it performs.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Rednek

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about it
customer_reviews.text: Our friend on the beach had one of these and it was pretty intriguing. So I bought one for my husband as an anniversary present and thought it was going to be pretty amazing.... Well..... get with the time Asobu hardly any of the new beer bottles, cans, y’all Monster cans will not fit..... We are debating returning it and getting a more versatile insulator.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: This rocks!!
customer_reviews.text: Ahhhmazing! Fits my short necks (805) long necks (shiner bock) cans (which I don’t do). It was 115* in Arizona yesterday and this kept my beer perfectly cold poolside for an hour. I’m ok with the silicone cap- my beer doesn’t last that long and it keeps the bugs out! Buy it, it works better than the bottlekeeper because it keeps it cold & more versatile!!
customer_reviews.author: Troy Talmadge

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Best beverage container chiller around, hands down. Keeps a standard bottle or can COLD. I used this for a beer on Thanksgiving, put the bottle in before starting to carve a roast and a ham. With the chaos of the day, it probably took me at least 40 minutes to finish that beer. When I was done, I took the bottle out and the glass was still frosty, like I had just pulled it out of the cooler. Can't ask for much more than that!
customer_reviews.author: Makoa

customer_reviews.title: Godd Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Definitely for use with a bottled beer... its a bit cumbersome for a can although I like the fact it van be used for either. The color and quality are Great. Be sure to hand wash even though some of the parts are top shelf dish washable. This would be a Phenomenal gift for anyone who enjoys a good cold beer.
customer_reviews.author: Goleray

customer_reviews.title: Should've got one sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Does a super job at keeping drinks cold! As other reviews have mentioned, you'll think you still have beverage left because of the temperature and be surprised when it's gone... the usual last few warm sips vanished :). Love the adaptable design: works well with bottles, regular soda-style cans, tall thinner cans.
customer_reviews.author: Drew400

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: This product is versatile and AWESOME! You can use it with cans or bottles! My husband first tested a can of coke in it and it stayed cold for a good 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: ImMrsJamesBitch

customer_reviews.title: Keeps beverage cold , minimal temperature loss
customer_reviews.text: This holder does the job. I don't think it is "vacuum sealed" since the outer metal does get cool when you put a cold beverage in. Works pretty good for cans , the rubber sealing ring comes up pretty high on the can with less than 1/4" protruding so it feels different to the bottom lip
customer_reviews.author: Rob in Troy MI

customer_reviews.title: Quality, but marble color is pink (unlike picture)
customer_reviews.text: These do a good job of keeping beers cold. Two important things, however: 1. The marble color is PINK. Be warned. See pic. 2. They unscrew in two places towards the middle. If you do it the wrong way, a beer bottle won’t quite fit in. I don’t really know why they made it this way, but take notice.
customer_reviews.author: JosephJFK

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: This item is less solid than I’d expected given the price. I bought this for my husband. He has a Bottlekeeper but that doesn’t accommodate cans. This item was reported to accommodate both and it does but it is not as solid and does not keep beer as cool as the Bottlekeeper. For the money, I’d prefer the Yeti for beer cans and the Bottlekeeper for bottles.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: This is a dream come true!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite products from Amazon! I always wanted a bottle koozie. This one has all the features to suit my needs. I love that it stores a bottle opener, and that I can cover my drink after I open it. The bonus part is that it turns into a can koozie too. You can't go wrong with this purchase. Oh, and it is spill proof.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Nice cold beverage keeper
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It keeps my beer nice and cold. The bottle opener is real cheap. After I purchased this brand, of course a dozen ads kept popping up for similiar items and one had a cord that kept the top attached to the bottle and the opener looked sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long neck ice cold beer holder
customer_reviews.text: I literally bring this with me everywhere bc I cannot stand a warm drink! I originally purchased this for camping and now use it all the time! I tested it by putting a beer from the fridge in it and leaving it outside on a hot day before I left for work and it was still pretty cool when I got home after work. Fits a glass bottle, regular can AND skinny cans for us basic white claw b’s.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome item
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty awesome, the only reason I give it 4 stars is it has a rubber ring inside at the bottom that comes out when you remove can/bottle sometimes and you have to stuff it back in. Other then that it’s great. It adjusts for cans, short neck bottles and long neck bottles
customer_reviews.author: Michael Roemer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Have 2 of them; ordered at the same time; 1 being the green camo, the second being the pink. Overall, cheap quality and overpriced in comparison to good name brands which sell for $10 less. The pink's bottle opener top is not secured to the rubber piece so is difficult to take off a bottle cap. No issues with the green version but still cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Seems Legit so Far
customer_reviews.text: Surprised hubby with it. He loved it and the copper color. It does not fit Bud Light bottle cans to be resealable, (top part of coozie won't go on) but those bottle's tops can be screwed back on, so no biggie. The bottom part of coozie does fit it.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan W.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping for something to keep my bottle of Bud cold while hanging out at a friends’ dock. I should have paid closer attention to the picture. The top half has no insulating value and is black! I did pick the stainless steel body hoping it would be cooler. While better than nothing or a basic coozie, it isn’t worth the money. Guess I’ll look for a Yeti alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks cold. Bottle opener is junk.
customer_reviews.text: The product is wonderful, except for the bottle opener. That part is impossible to use without hurting your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Joey H

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Giving it five stars because it does the job to keep the drink called! The bottle opener at the top is really hard to get back into the rubber but still giving it five stars because the other good parts about it make up for it!
customer_reviews.author: B. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Not for modelo beer
customer_reviews.text: Fits standard beer bottles but can't fit a modelo beer 😭 works as expected
customer_reviews.author: OZ

customer_reviews.title: Kept beer nice and cold
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our beech vacation. Worked great at keeping my beer cold while sitting on the beech. Kept it as cold as when I got it out of the cooler. Just make sure you take a can opener with you because the one that is “built in” stinks! Mine popped ou the first time I tried to use it. I would buy it again, I just remembered to take can opener along after the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Westenberger

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for someone in my family who (1) likes beer and (2) attends lots of outdoor gatherings for car enthusiasts. It will be the perfect way to keep beer cold on a hot day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottle opener does not work well.
customer_reviews.text: What attracted me to this product was the look which I like but mostly having a bottle opener at my fingertips. Not impressed with the bottle opener. Not a convenience in order to open a bottle. The dial does not stay in place to open the bottle and is really difficult to put back in its place.
customer_reviews.author: Rosena Porche

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift but kept for myself
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I originally bought it as a gift but wanted to test it out and ended up liking it so much I’m keeping it for myself. I tend to open a beverage and don’t drink it quickly. This cozy keeps my drinks (both cans and bottles) close to ice cold over 2 hours time. It’s not cheap, but this is made to last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: sasi_grl

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle cooler
customer_reviews.text: Well thought out beverage cooler. Only the bottom section is double walled, but still kept my beverage cold longer than I would need to finish it. Fits short or long necked bottles and I will be purchasing more as gifts. Great around a pool.
customer_reviews.author: Darkknight1951

customer_reviews.title: uses every day
customer_reviews.text: i got this for my husband becouse he takes for ever to drink a beer (kids) and by the time he gets to finish he is drinking luck warm tea lol. this keeps the beer cold for about an hour giving him plenty of time to drink it still cold
customer_reviews.author: Devin Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Only fits long necked bottles or standard cans
customer_reviews.text: This product works as advertised for standard cans and longnecked bottles. What it doesn’t say in the ads is that’s all it is sized for... stubbie or fat bottles, along with the newer tall cans don’t fit well or at all. Good product, but marketing needs to be upfront about what it’s designed for.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Earned an extra star
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product and was going to give it 4 stars simply based on the rubber top that will keep bugs out of your drink, but probably won’t stop your drink from spilling if it tipped over. It earned an extra star because I bought the Bottlekeeper that actually has a commercial. I used both in 98 degree temp and this product was significantly better than the Bottlekeeper.
customer_reviews.author: J.G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for people hard to buy for
customer_reviews.text: My step dad is hard to buy for. And for the guy who has everything, this was perfect! It keeps his beer cold to the last drop and he uses it constantly. Also helps secure glass bottles whole using at a pool, great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dad Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a bday gift for my husband and he absolutely loves it. It keeps his beer cold, can or bottle. The design is great and makes your beer much more portable. We ended up buying a second for my brother.
customer_reviews.author: pdxreviewer

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Just okay. . It does seem to keep drink cold. Priced hi for
customer_reviews.author: Rain Hankins

customer_reviews.title: Defective Item
customer_reviews.text: This product was defective. Does not fit a beer bottle. We bought 2 one worked this one didn’t. Only realized it a day ago when using for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping your beer cold until you finish it, no need for 36 hours right? It is a little bit chunky but I love that it protects the bottle so if an accident occurred it will most likely not break.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Sepulveda Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my dad and husband. Both love it. It's good quality and keeps drinks cold. It's a little bulky in size and they should have tethered the cap/bottle opener to it because its bound to get misplaced. Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: DIY home projects

customer_reviews.title: Might Lose YourCap
customer_reviews.text: The cap is not attached and could easily be lost. Also the bottle cap remover could be lost easily and it’s difficult to put back in place when done using it. They give you an extra one probably because it gets lost.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Prier

customer_reviews.title: No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, used it two nights of semi heavy drinking. It really does keep the beers cooler. Con is how bulky it is, but worth the sacrifice for cold beer. I don’t regret the purchase. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: ozark705

customer_reviews.title: Good double duty and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Gifted it for Father's day and my father-in-law was very happy with it. He loves beer (bottle) and diet coke (can), so this bottle being able to do double duty is great! I'm making him bring it on the cruise when we travel, so I'm eager to see even more good it'll do!
customer_reviews.author: Hazelin Ngan

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to camouflage a can or bottle of beer. This is perfect because it can fit any size bottle or can. Will be great for the beach, and also being a musician, I can drink beer on stage without anyone knowing.... :)
customer_reviews.author: Ed Aureli

customer_reviews.title: A gift. Haven't used it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for a friend moving to Texas and likes her beer cold. I bought this instead of the Yeti because it works with cans and bottles. Reviews are good so I hope it will be the perfect gift for her.
customer_reviews.author: rosemary kirk

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: When I received the bottle cooler it had a dent in the inside bottom and there is some kind of debris inside the the vacuum sealed part because it jingles and rattles around when you pick it up or move it.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Bottle opener part is almost useless, but in an emergency its handy enough I guess. Keeps a beer cool, put it in a floating cup holder and spend some time in the water...ya got a perfect day.
customer_reviews.author: S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Hard to hold
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea however I have arthritis in my thumbs. when you put a bottle or can inside of this container it suddenly becomes twice as large and difficult to hold. I feel like what works better for me is just transferring my beer into a insulated travel mug.
customer_reviews.author: R. Linden

customer_reviews.title: Could've been 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Would've given five stars all the way but ordered the one with American flag and got a plian one if this was the one I wanted could've saved the money and ordered the one i ended up with gonna try and contact manufacturer update they said they would send me the right one been 8 weeks still no new now to late to get a refund
customer_reviews.author: Micheal

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping beverages cold
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for bottle beer. Stays cold right to the end!! Especially in the hot weather. It is a little bulky but my hands are small. I still love that it keeps my beverage cold
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really keeps your beer cold. I think I drink faster cause my beer is always empty before I know it! The only bottle that hasn’t worked so far is a modeling negra- it’s too wide at the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Craig F.

customer_reviews.title: Your long neck bottle needs this!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for Christmas gifts....they love them! Really works well keeping liquids cold. Great to have where children are around and a drink is left out.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for hubby's beer
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loved this since we have a pool and he likes the Bud Light Oranges. This year, we could only find them in the bottles. A few party fouls happened and so when I found this right before Christmas I thought heck yeah. He was pretty happy with the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Riojas

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, bulky, and over priced ( Not worth The Money )
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product at all. It was bulky and cheaply made. I took it out of the box and immediately put it back in the package. I will be returning it as soon as I get back home from offshore.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Keller

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this for about a week, but my husband absolutely loves it already. You can use cans or bottles and it also has a bottle opener that can be stored in the top. So long as it lasts and doesn't rust or fall apart, we will be very pleased with our purchase. Totally giftable for anybody who enjoys keeping their beverages cold.
customer_reviews.author: E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great All in one for a beer drinker
customer_reviews.text: I love this beer bottle/can holder. It has an opener, keeps bottles and cans cold. It is a little bulky and doesn't fit in most cup holders, but overall a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Summer Newman

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my step-father.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a christmas gift for my step father and I have not seen him without it once since last christmas! Either he drinks way too much beer or he really really loves this coozy.. or both. :)
customer_reviews.author: Angela Dormido

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for his birthday and he LOVES it! It's awesome that you can use it for cans or bottles, and the bottle opener on it works pretty decent. He likes that you can completely cap the bottle so no bugs get in. If you're debating getting one, just get it. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky's-wifey

customer_reviews.title: Great functioning product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Father’s Day gift and it is loved! Great beer can or bottle coozie! The bottle opener on the top is the icing on the cake. Really great product.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Bottle open falls off easily.
customer_reviews.text: This is ok, it does the job it’s supposed to. I liked the fact that it has the bottle opener on top but it doesn’t stay on when you use it. You have to hold it on and it falls off easily. Other then that, the cooling part is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Figz

customer_reviews.title: My bf loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my boyfriend to use while we are off-roading, to keep the glass from breaking as well as the drink from spilling! It works great, and he uses it for just about every outdoor activity. I love that it can be used for cans AND bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Young

customer_reviews.title: Works great at keeping drinks cold for hours
customer_reviews.text: Used these in Florida in temps in the upper 80’s and beverages stayed cold! I even used for bottles of water after drinking some of the water, the bottle smashed to fit. Not for all containers, but did use for ultra glass, Mikes hard lemonade. Bud light seltzer’s fit bit some good f the van was above the top of the cooler.
customer_reviews.author: mzmiller

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting more here. The item is a little heavy / bulky and it keeps beer cold but I expected it to stay colder longer. These are ok.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my boyfriend and he loved it. It was about 85 and humid camping and he said it stayed cold the entire time. He had others asking where he got it from too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole St. Clair

customer_reviews.title: Actually works.
customer_reviews.text: Does a pretty good job of keeping my beer cold for a couple of hours. Not as effective as something like a Yeti cooler but head and shoulders above single wall options like BottleKeeper. I would recommend this one.l
customer_reviews.author: Wood in Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Keeps beer cold and protects glass bottles
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these! Keeps bottled beer cold when outside! One got knocked over and it saved the glass bottle from breaking! Very durable!
customer_reviews.author: jlm

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value and work well to keep beverages cold even on hot days. Have had this for a couple of years now and it's still works great!
customer_reviews.author: AMAZON FOR LIFE

product_meta.title: Asobu Frosty Beer 2 Go Vacuum Insulated Double Walled Stainless Steel Beer Can and Bottle Cooler with Beer Opener (black)
feature_bullets: ULTIMATE COOLER Asobu’s Frosty Beer 2 Go is the ultimate beer chiller combination for beer bottles and beer cans
INSULATE THE WHOLE BOTTLE The Vacuum Insulated Double walled stainless steel construction guarantees a frosty cold beer for hours on end
FULLY EQUIPPED Complete with a built in Beer Bottle opener this fantastic cooler has got everything you need to enjoy your beer
PARTY FAVORITE Perfect size for any beer can or bottle so forget about the mug you can enjoy your favorite beer at a party, at the beach or a barbeque
GREAT GIFT OPTIONS Available in many color options so you can get this for yourself or as a much appreciated gift for any beer lover

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,481 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
